document.title: Red, Purple and Pink: The Colors of Diffusion on Pinterest (Extract)
document.citation: Bakhshi S, Gilbert E (2015) Red, Purple and Pink: The Colors of Diffusion on Pinterest. PLoS ONE 10(2): e0117148. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0117148
document.body: Psychological studies suggest that White has a calming effect, producing the least amount of tension [56, 57]. The implication is that higher value, lighter colors should be more relaxing than lower value, darker colors.
